item.title: TuneStory
item.description: See https://github.com/CzzzzH/TuneStory Introduction This project is a tiny Music Game developped by Qt The game only runs at 1920 * 1080 resolution and the platform of Windows. You can make your own song charts in this game, and the guide is included in the 制谱指南.txt Currently the game server is down, so the user system and leaderboards are not available now. You can still play with the single game. Screenshots 1
